quote:
To move towards the light
first you need to put down roots
quote_level_1:
To move towards the light
first you need to put down roots
quote_level_2:
Movement is breath
that has become body
quote_level_3:
Form is born where
earth and water meet

nav.home_description:
ONDA Life is a practice of self-awareness and body awareness.

Connect your tracker or smartwatch in settings and observe how your vital signs change during practice in real time.

The greater your success in completing practices ‚Äî your time in practice and improvement in your state ‚Äî the more OND in your account. A connected tracker or smartwatch will also increase your earnings for completing practices.

When all practices of a part are completed with more than 40% success, you unlock the next level.

And remember that the ONDA level system is a long chain of realizations through feeling yourself as an amoeba, fish, animal, primate, human, brain cell, DNA, and finally, an atom. But if you give due attention to each stage, your journey will be easy and fulfilling.

At the beginning of each part before practices you will see general guidance. At the end of each part ‚Äì more detailed attunement to the current state of practices.

Good luck on your journey!

level_goals.title: Level Goals
level_goals.main_goal: Learn to recognize presence ‚Äî to feel your existence as a miracle. Stabilize breathing, return attention to the body, awaken the sensation of 'living light' within.
level_goals.essence_line1: All that is required ‚Äî is to learn to be.
level_goals.essence_line2: Without purpose, without struggle, without striving.
level_goals.essence_line3: To feel life not with the mind, but with the body.
level_goals.final_note: Remember the ancient language of breath, warmth, and light that the Earth speaks.

circuits.title: Consciousness Circuits
circuits.circuit_1_desc:
Awareness of the very fact of presence.
No tasks, no goals ‚Äî just the feeling of "I am alive"
Point of zero effort, the first breath of the Universe.
circuits.circuit_2_desc:
Awareness of movement and direction through flow.
Not a route, not a goal ‚Äî only the feeling of "I swim".
Point of the first impulse, the first wave of movement.
circuits.circuit_3_desc:
Mastery of two worlds: water's fluidity + earth's support.
Not fight or flight ‚Äî adapting form to conditions.
Point of balance: first stable step and breath between two worlds.

practices.title: Circuit Practices
practices.journal_empty_hint: Start a practice to create your first entry

practice_messages.breath_message: Inhale ‚Äî attention to the center of the body, exhale ‚Äî gentle glow from within. Feel the breath as life.
practice_messages.being_message: Sit for 3 minutes, just observing the breath. Realize "I am" without action.
practice_messages.pulse_message: Place your hand on your belly or heart, feel the warmth. Feel life in your body.
practice_messages.still_message: Feel breath as movement within stillness.
practice_messages.listening_message: Close your eyes and listen to body sounds (pulse, breath). Listen to your body.
practice_messages.light_message: On inhale ‚Äî light gathers in the center, on exhale ‚Äî spreads through the body. Awaken inner light.
practice_messages.liquid_message: Imagine you are a drop of water; move diffusely without effort. Feel yourself as liquid.
practice_messages.count_message: Count 10 breath cycles without losing awareness. Focus attention on breath.
practice_messages.stillness_message: Feel a point of stillness inside your body. Find the center of perception.
practice_messages.silence_message: 6 minutes without thoughts or movements ‚Äî just being. Experience pure presence.
practice_messages.ground_message: Inhale ‚Äî into chest, exhale ‚Äî into the earth through feet. Connect heaven and earth through body.
practice_messages.root_message: Feel the weight of your body. From the base of your spine, roots grow deep into the earth. With each exhale, roots go deeper. You are a tree.
practice_messages.flow_rhythm_message: Enter the rhythm of water: inhale ‚Äî meet the wave, exhale ‚Äî follow it.
practice_messages.directional_sense_message: Find the easy line of movement: where the body feels lighter ‚Äî that's the right direction.
practice_messages.rhythm_movement_message: Connect breath and wave: inhale ‚Äî gather yourself, exhale ‚Äî glide.
practice_messages.water_balance_message: Stand softly. Knees spring. Inhale ‚Äî axis, exhale ‚Äî support.
practice_messages.fluid_motion_message: Become water: round your movements, soften angles, breathe smoothly.
practice_messages.wave_breath_message: Inhale ‚Äî wave rises, exhale ‚Äî gentle retreat. Listen to the ocean inside your chest.
practice_messages.sense_of_flow_message: Let the mind be still. Let the body indicate the direction of ease.
practice_messages.flow_focus_message: Choose one point of gaze. Move softly ‚Äî stay here.
practice_messages.flow_adapt_message: Maintain center. Allow body to softly adjust trajectory.
practice_messages.still_water_message: Reduce movement to almost zero. Listen to silence beneath the wave of breath.
practice_messages.deep_current_message: Listen not to waves, but to the low underwater current ‚Äî it guides from within.
practice_messages.echo_ocean_message: Inhale ‚Äî call, exhale ‚Äî answer. Become quieter to hear the ocean within.
practice_messages.breath_of_transition_message: Inhale ‚Äî water, exhale ‚Äî earth. Breathe two worlds.
practice_messages.balance_point_message: Inhale ‚Äî gather axis, exhale ‚Äî anchor support. Center ‚Äî above mid-foot.
practice_messages.adaptive_flow_message: Center remains ‚Äî form changes. Be water in clay.
practice_messages.ground_air_breath_message: Inhale ‚Äî to sky, exhale ‚Äî to the earth. Center remains calm.
practice_messages.step_of_stability_message: Maintain axis. Weight ‚Äî in support. Step is born from exhale.
practice_messages.wave_of_breath_message: Inhale ‚Äî wave rises up spine, exhale ‚Äî descends into feet.
practice_messages.breath_bridge_message: Inhale ‚Äî gather (water), exhale ‚Äî root (earth). Between them ‚Äî bridge.
practice_messages.center_of_gravity_message: Place attention in lower belly. Breathe so weight stands at mid-foot.
practice_messages.shape_shift_message: Center ‚Äî in place, form ‚Äî for the task. Breathe and change softly.
practice_messages.resonant_stillness_message: Freeze steadily. Breath ‚Äî quiet, exhale slightly longer. Listen to silence beneath breath.
practice_messages.pulse_of_earth_message: Listen to low rhythm under feet: inhale ‚Äî gathers, exhale ‚Äî goes into depth.
practice_messages.breath_of_adaptation_message: Inhale ‚Äî accept conditions, exhale ‚Äî strengthen support. Find your working rhythm.

practice_items.flow_breathing_desc: Breath like a wave: inhale-exhale without pauses
practice_items.ground_flow_desc: Connect heaven and earth through body
practice_items.flow_rhythm_desc: Merge with flow and feel its rhythm
practice_items.balance_point_desc: Find and hold center of balance
practice_items.adaptive_flow_desc: Change form to conditions without losing center
practice_items.ground_air_breath_desc: Synchronize inhale with air and exhale with earth
practice_items.step_of_stability_desc: Take first stable step on earth
practice_items.wave_of_breath_desc: Combine water's softness and earth's density
practice_items.breath_bridge_desc: Connect inhale and exhale in single arc between elements
practice_items.center_of_gravity_desc: Find and stabilize center of gravity above support
practice_items.shape_shift_desc: Change form and orientation, maintaining center and support
practice_items.breath_of_adaptation_desc: Anchor new form and rhythm in changed environment

artifacts.life_rhythm_desc: Sleep and wake up at the same time for 7 days in a row
artifacts.life_rhythm_alert: üåô Biotracker monitors your sleep automatically. Go to bed and wake up at the same time for 7 days in a row.

streak_3.name: 3-Day Streak
streak_3.desc: Complete practices 3 days in a row

journal.title: Practice Journal
journal.start_practice: Start a practice to create your first entry

emotional_states.calmness_desc: You are in a state of inner peace
emotional_states.fatigue_desc: Your body needs rest and recovery
emotional_states.inspiration_desc: You are full of creative energy

philosophy.text_1: You don't have to do anything to be.
philosophy.text_3: Being is already movement. Listen to how Earth breathes in you.
philosophy.text_4: With each exhale, Earth accepts you.
philosophy.text_5: Your breath connects heaven and roots.
philosophy.text_6: The deeper your foundation ‚Äî the higher the light rises.

level_1.text_1: You don't have to do anything to be.
level_1.text_3: Being is already movement. Listen to how Earth breathes in you.
level_1.text_4: With each exhale, Earth accepts you.
level_1.text_5: Your breath connects heaven and roots.
level_1.text_6: The deeper your foundation ‚Äî the higher the light rises.

level_2.text_1: You emerge from the stillness you lived in before.
level_2.text_2: The world around is an ocean of light, liquid time.
level_2.text_3: You breathe and feel how waves guide you.
level_2.text_4: There is no path, there is flow.
level_2.text_5: You are the movement itself, and each breath becomes direction.

level_3.text_1: The earth becomes solid beneath your feet.
level_3.text_3: You learn to hold and to release.
level_3.text_4: Form is born where elements meet.
level_3.text_5: Your body knows the language of survival.

level_2.explore_desc: lines of flow and quiet pools (water/depths/light boundaries)
level_2.collect_desc: steady breath rhythm and comfort trajectories (tempo/pauses/smoothness)
level_2.react_desc: approach warm/bright zones and avoid cold/noisy areas (follow/evade, accelerate/slow down)

level_3.react_desc: choose safe territory and defend against danger (attack/hide, stop/rush)

auth.confirmation_message: We sent you a confirmation link. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your email address.

settings.name_too_long: Name cannot be longer than 30 characters
settings.name_info: üí° Your name will be shown in the player leaderboard. Choose a name that will represent you in the ONDA community.
settings.flow_desc: HR slightly above baseline, stable BR
settings.instruction_1: On phone: Close standard tracker app
settings.instruction_2: On tracker: Settings ‚Üí Share heart rate ‚Üí Enable
settings.notification_hr_info: Get periodic heart rate updates from your fitness tracker app (Mi Fitness, Fitbit, Samsung Health, etc.)

shop.title: OND Shop
shop.subtitle: Accelerate your spiritual evolution
shop.info_1: OND is the quantum unit of your spiritual progress
shop.info_3: Accelerate your journey through consciousness circuits
shop.info_4: Earn OND through daily practices or purchase for instant access

emotional_check.title: Emotional Check
emotional_check.subtitle: Voice-Based Emotional State Analysis
emotional_check.instruction_detail: Speak naturally about how you feel right now
emotional_check.analyzing_detail: Detecting emotional patterns and energy levels
emotional_check.rec_calmness: Your voice reflects inner peace. Perfect time for deep meditation or contemplative practices.
emotional_check.rec_joy: High positive energy detected. Great moment for creative practices or sharing with others.
emotional_check.rec_anxiety: Tension detected in your voice. Try breathing practices or grounding exercises to restore balance.
emotional_check.rec_fatigue: Your energy is low. Rest is important now. Consider gentle restorative practices.
emotional_check.rec_inspiration: You're full of creative energy! Perfect time for exploring new practices or journaling.
emotional_check.rec_contemplation: Reflective state detected. Good time for inner listening and self-inquiry practices.

p1_1:
Feel the breath as life.
Inhale ‚Äî attention to the center of the body.
Exhale ‚Äî gentle glow from within.

Let the body find its own rhythm.
Don't control the breath ‚Äî observe it.

Each inhale connects you with Earth.
Each exhale returns you to peace.

Simply be in the breath.
It breathes in you, and you breathe in it.
p1_2: Sit comfortably. Allow breath to become natural.

Don't seek anything. Don't fix.
Simply observe ‚Äî inhale, exhale, pause.
Feel that life happens by itself.

In each inhale ‚Äî birth,
in each exhale ‚Äî return.

Feel simple presence.
Nothing needs to be achieved ‚Äî you already are.

All that exists now ‚Äî breath, body, peace.
Let awareness gently rest inside.
p1_3: Place your hand on your belly or heart.
Feel the beating under your palm. This is the pulse of life ‚Äî ancient, reliable, real.
Inhale ‚Äî warmth gathers inside. Exhale ‚Äî it softly spreads through the body.
Allow the heart to breathe with Earth. Don't rush. Just listen to the rhythm.
Each beat is "I live". Each exhale is "I feel".
Let the body remember how to be alive.
p1_4: All living things sway ‚Äî even in stillness there is a wave.

Take a breath ‚Äî and feel the body gently expand.
Exhale ‚Äî and the world becomes quieter.

Let everything slow down.
No rush, no goal.
Only soft flow inside.

Feel how the the breath becomes almost invisible,
but continues to connect you with life.

In this stillness there is strength.
In this silence ‚Äî the movement of the world.
p1_5:
Close your eyes.
Let silence enter inside.

Listen not to sounds, but to the space between them.
There lives breath, beating, whisper of life.

Feel how the the the heart sounds in the body.
How lungs answer it with gentle rhythm.

Listen to micro-movements ‚Äî warmth, pulsation, energy flow.
All this is the body's language, saying: "I am alive".

Don't try to analyze. Just listen.
The body knows how peace sounds.
Let attention dissolve in this inner music.
p1_6: Take a breath and feel light gathering in the center of the chest.
It's small ‚Äî like a spark, like a point of warmth.

Exhale ‚Äî and this spark gently spreads through the body.
Let breath become light moving through you.

Inhale ‚Äî gather light.
Exhale ‚Äî share it.

Feel how the the the body fills with radiance from within.
Light doesn't come from outside ‚Äî it's remembered from the depths.
Notice how with each breath the inner space becomes more transparent.

Let attention gently rest in the chest.
Where warm pulse connects you with Earth and sky.

Inhale ‚Äî like sunrise.
Exhale ‚Äî like gentle evening.

Let breath become movement of light in the body.
Let each cell softly respond to this radiance.
Don't strive to make light brighter ‚Äî just allow it to be.

It knows its rhythm.
It knows the path from heart to every part of you.
Feel that in this moment everything is illuminated from within.

Even silence glows.
Even peace breathes with light.
p1_7:
Feel the body.
Imagine it's not solid, but fluid.
As if each cell is filled with soft, warm water.
Take a breath ‚Äî water rises, fills chest, shoulders, arms.
Exhale ‚Äî and the flow softly descends to belly, to feet.

Feel how the the breath becomes tide and ebb.
Everything inside moves smoothly, without effort.
Allow the body to dissolve in its own breath.

Inhale ‚Äî you gather into one wave.
Exhale ‚Äî you spread in space.

All that's solid becomes mobile.
All that's tense turns into fluidity.

Feel liquid moving under the skin.
As if water carries attention, cleansing and enlivening the body.

No "self", no "body" ‚Äî only movement of life.
I am form of water, breathing light.

If attention freezes ‚Äî just gently return it to movement.
Each breath ‚Äî a wave.
Each pause ‚Äî peace between tides.

Allow Earth to feel your flow.
Allow yourself to feel Earth through it.

Everything flows.
Everything is connected.
Everything lives by water's breath.
p1_8: Sit calmly. Allow breath to go naturally.

Feel how the the the inhale is born by itself ‚Äî
and how the exhale completes it without effort.

Start counting breaths ‚Äî
inhale one, exhale one.
Inhale two, exhale two.

Count gently, without tension.
Let numbers be not with mind, but with breath.

If attention wanders ‚Äî simply return to the next inhale.
Don't judge yourself, don't rush.
Each new breath is a beginning.
Feel how the the with each count the mind becomes more transparent.

Numbers dissolve, rhythm remains.
Counting becomes breath's music.

Inhale ‚Äî gentle filling of body.
Exhale ‚Äî soft descent of attention.

When you breathe consciously, breath becomes support.
It holds you, as Earth holds a seed.

Feel the simplicity of the moment.
One inhale, one exhale.

All that's needed ‚Äî to be here, in this rhythm.
No end, no goal, only breath and peace.

You and breath are one whole.
Counting is simply form of presence.

Let each inhale sound like the word "I".
And each exhale ‚Äî like the word "AM".
p1_9:
Close your eyes.
Take a few soft breaths.
Feel how the the with each exhale the body becomes quieter.

Somewhere deep inside there's a point,
where nothing happens ‚Äî no movement, no thought.
Don't seek it. Allow it to manifest itself.

Inhale ‚Äî attention gathers in the center.
Exhale ‚Äî dissolves everything extra.

Inside inhale ‚Äî peace.
Inside exhale ‚Äî peace.
Between them ‚Äî silence.

Feel how the the time slows down.
Everything inside gently stops,
but life continues ‚Äî without your participation.

Feel the center of perception ‚Äî motionless axis in the body's depth.
Everything revolves around it,
but it itself remains unchanged.

This is not a place and not an image ‚Äî
it's presence without form.
The less you try, the clearer it sounds.

Let breath become a whisper.
Let attention descend into the root of silence.

Here there's no "I" and "world" ‚Äî
there's only peace from which breath is born.

Feel that in this peace ‚Äî there's strength.
In this silence ‚Äî source of movement.
All you seek is already breathing inside this point.
p1_10:
Sit comfortably.
Feel how the the breath becomes invisible.

No need to breathe deeper.
No need to control.
Everything already happens by itself.
Allow the body to be motionless.

Feel that inside this stillness
breath continues to move ‚Äî
gently, like whisper of time.

Don't listen to breath ‚Äî be it.
Don't observe silence ‚Äî become it.

Everything extra dissolves.
Words, thoughts, forms ‚Äî become transparent.

Only awareness remains.
It's without boundaries, without name, without beginning.

Body ‚Äî simply Earth's breath.
Mind ‚Äî reflection of space.
All that is ‚Äî presence.

Feel how the the from within rises gentle light.
It doesn't move ‚Äî simply is.

Breathe this light.
Be light that listens to itself.

No more "I" and "silence" ‚Äî
there's only breath that knows itself.

In this breath ‚Äî peace.
In this peace ‚Äî life.
In this life ‚Äî you.
p1_11:
Stand steadily. Feel your feet.
Expand contact with the earth ‚Äî as if soles become wider and heavier.

Inhale ‚Äî raise attention from feet to chest.
Feel how the the warm space opens in the center.

Exhale ‚Äî direct everything down, through legs, into the earth.
Imagine how roots of light grow from feet.

With each inhale ‚Äî chest fills with warmth.
With each exhale ‚Äî roots go deeper, finding water and stone.
Don't hurry. Let gravity do the work for you.

Inhale ‚Äî gather strength in chest, straighten shoulders, become taller.
Exhale ‚Äî release tension downward: knees soft, jaw free, belly warm.

Feel weight, but as support, not obstacle.
Earth holds you.

If mind goes into thoughts ‚Äî return to the soles of your feet.
Right here ‚Äî your support and home.

Inhale ‚Äî like a ray from heart to sky.
Exhale ‚Äî like a river going to planet's core.

Roots branch out, embrace soil, intertwine with its pulse.
You stand, and world breathes through you.

Feel how the the confidence rises from bottom up:
feet ‚Üí shins ‚Üí pelvis ‚Üí belly ‚Üí chest ‚Üí throat ‚Üí crown.

Let the body become trunk, and breath ‚Äî sap.
Strength is not in tension, but in connection.

You are a tree: tall with breath, deep with roots.
Here it's safe. Here you're home.
p1_12:
Stand steadily. Feel feet completely ‚Äî heels, pads, toes.
Allow weight to descend. Knees soft, pelvis gets heavier.

Transfer attention to the base of spine.
Feel warm point in pelvis center ‚Äî your root.

Inhale ‚Äî chest gently opens, spine lengthens, crown reaches toward sky.
Exhale ‚Äî release everything down the spine, through thighs and shins to feet.

Imagine from the base of spine and from feet
roots grow ‚Äî warm, alive, feeling.

With each exhale roots go deeper, find moist soil, stone, water.
With each inhale from the earth rises calmness and support.

Allow jaw to relax, shoulders to get heavy and descend.
Breathe like a tree: trunk ‚Äî your spine, sap ‚Äî your breath.

If attention goes into thoughts ‚Äî return to the soles.
Notice floor pressure, temperature, micro-movements in toes.

Expand roots to the sides ‚Äî forward, back, left, right ‚Äî
until invisible network of support emerges around you.

Inhale ‚Äî gather strength in chest center.
Exhale ‚Äî direct it down, strengthen roots, trust the earth.

Feel boundaries of your space:
"Here I stand. Here is my home. Here I can be heavy and real".

The deeper the roots ‚Äî the freer the breath,
the quieter the mind, the clearer the heart.
p2_1: Inhale ‚Äî meet the wave, exhale ‚Äî follow it.
Feel how the the breath guides movement.
p2_2: Find the easy line of movement.
Where body feels lighter ‚Äî that's right.
p2_4: Water carries but doesn't knock down.
p2_7: Let body indicate direction of ease.
Feel flow with body, not mind.
p2_10: Listen to silence beneath breath wave.
p2_12: Become quieter to hear ocean within.
p3_1: Stand steadily: feet supported, knees soft, axis long.
On inhale imagine cool, flowing water filling sides and back; chest becomes wider.
On exhale direct attention down ‚Äî through belly, pelvis and legs ‚Äî warm weight goes into the earth.
Keep rhythm 4‚Äì6: inhale shorter, exhale longer ‚Äî this way transition stabilizes.
Feel how the the water gives fluidity on inhale, and earth gives support on exhale.
If tension appears in throat or shoulders ‚Äî soften exhale and return weight to feet.
Do several cycles 'water ‚Üí earth', then reduce effort to almost imperceptible movement, leaving only sensation of element shift.
Check center: belly warm, lower back soft, gaze calm.
Finish with three breaths emphasizing exhale down ‚Äî anchor support.
p3_2: Stand softly: feet hip-width. Find 'triangle of foot': heel ‚Äî base of big toe ‚Äî base of little toe.
Knees spring, pelvis neutral, crown reaches up ‚Äî like flexible thread.
Place palm on lower belly and note warm center point (slightly below navel).
Do micro-scan forward/back and left/right ‚Äî amplitude 5%.
Where exhale becomes longer and warmer ‚Äî there's your 'zero'.
Inhale ‚Äî axis lengthens; exhale ‚Äî weight evenly distributes across triangle of feet.
Check pressure balance: heel ‚Üî ball of big toe ‚Üî ball of little toe ‚Äî no tilts.
Soften shoulders and jaw, tongue free; gaze soft, on 'horizon'.
If swaying ‚Äî reduce amplitude and lengthen exhale (4‚Äì6), return attention to feet.
Maintain 1% living movement ‚Äî balance doesn't freeze, it breathes.
Repeat anchor: belly center warm, spine long, feet wide. Here ‚Äî your stability.
p3_3: Stand softly: feet hip-width, knees spring, belly warm ‚Äî this is your center.
Inhale ‚Äî gather axis; exhale ‚Äî soften movement edges.
Imagine joints filled with warm liquid: melt knees, pelvis, shoulders, neck.
Explore three basic forms: elongation (longer), rounding (softer), spiral (more plastic).
On inhale ‚Äî elongate in chosen form; on exhale ‚Äî round and return to center.
Change form by body/environment signal: where breath is easier ‚Äî there's adaptation.
Keep amplitude 5‚Äì10%: movement almost invisible, but felt from inside.
Center doesn't wander: palm on belly reminds ‚Äî axis stays, only contours change.
If 'hard angle' appears ‚Äî pause on exhale and melt it with attention.
Combine forms: elongation ‚Üí spiral ‚Üí rounding ‚Üí center (one breath cycle per phase).
With each cycle simplify: less force, more fluidity; less speed, more feeling.
Finish with several breaths in neutral pose ‚Äî plasticity preserved, center calm.
p3_4: Stand or sit steadily: feet supported, crown reaches up, shoulders soft.
Place one palm on chest, other on lower belly.
Inhale: feel cool, light air ‚Äî chest and collarbones expand up and to sides.
Exhale: direct attention down ‚Äî through belly, pelvis and legs into earth; weight becomes warmer and heavier.
Keep rhythm 4‚Äì6: inhale shorter, exhale longer ‚Äî this brings stability.
Stay several cycles in image: 'sky fills ‚Äî earth receives'.
Check axis: on inhale it lengthens, on exhale weighs down to feet.
If breathing becomes noisy ‚Äî soften inhale, keep long warm exhale.
Notice how with each exhale jaw, shoulders, belly calm down.
Reduce effort: inhale like feather, exhale like root.
At end do three calm exhales emphasizing feet ‚Äî anchor support.
p3_5: Stand steadily: feet hip-width, knees soft, axis long.
Feel weight of body: pelvis heavy, spine vertical, crown to sky.
Inhale ‚Äî gather axis; exhale ‚Äî send weight down through one leg.
On long exhale shift weight 100% to one foot ‚Äî slowly, like root growing.
Free leg becomes light; lift it slightly off floor ‚Äî 2‚Äì3 cm, no higher.
Hold balance: inhale ‚Äî stabilize axis, exhale ‚Äî strengthen support.
Place free foot forward or to side ‚Äî gently, toe first, then heel.
Transfer weight to new foot on exhale ‚Äî smooth, connected, without rush.
Repeat: step is born from exhale, support ‚Äî from inhale.
If balance shakes ‚Äî pause, lengthen exhale, return attention to supporting foot.
Do 5‚Äì7 slow steps, keeping warm center in belly.
Finish standing on both feet ‚Äî feel how earth holds you.
p3_6: Stand softly: feet hip-width, knees soft, crown up.
On inhale imagine warm wave rising from tailbone up spine to crown.
On exhale wave descends ‚Äî through belly, pelvis, legs into feet.
Keep rhythm 4‚Äì6: inhale lifts wave, exhale sends it down.
Feel spine as flexible channel: breath flows through it like water.
Soften shoulders, free jaw; let wave move spine naturally.
If lower back tightens ‚Äî reduce amplitude, breathe into belly.
Imagine: inhale ‚Äî spine is river flowing up, exhale ‚Äî waterfall down.
Keep feet as roots: warm, wide, deeply connected to earth.
With each exhale roots go deeper, support becomes more reliable.
Repeat 7‚Äì10 cycles, then simplify to almost imperceptible wave.
Finish with three exhales into feet ‚Äî anchor stability.
p3_7: Stand or sit comfortably: spine vertical, feet connected to earth.
On inhale imagine light, flowing water filling chest and back ‚Äî fluidity.
On exhale direct attention down ‚Äî through belly and legs into earth ‚Äî density.
Keep rhythm 4‚Äì6: inhale gathers like water, exhale roots like earth.
Feel transition point: where water meets earth ‚Äî that's your center.
Breathe so each phase is distinct: inhale ‚Äî lightness, exhale ‚Äî weight.
If confusion appears ‚Äî pause on exhale, feel feet, then continue.
Imagine bridge between two worlds: upper ‚Äî fluid, lower ‚Äî stable.
Your body is meeting point: breath connects what seems separate.
Soften jaw and shoulders; let bridge be natural, not forced.
Repeat 7‚Äì10 cycles, notice how both elements live in you simultaneously.
Finish with three exhales down ‚Äî strengthen earth side of bridge.
p3_8: Stand with feet hip-width, knees soft.
Place attention in lower belly (2 fingers below navel) ‚Äî your center of gravity.
On inhale feel how center warms and stabilizes.
On exhale send weight down through legs ‚Äî feel it settling at mid-foot.
Check that weight doesn't shift to toes or heels ‚Äî stay in middle.
Keep rhythm 4‚Äì6: long exhale strengthens stability.
Imagine plumb line from crown through belly center to mid-foot.
If you sway ‚Äî reduce amplitude, breathe into belly, connect to feet.
Soften shoulders and jaw; gaze soft on horizon.
Feel how the the with each exhale center lowers and stabilizes.
Do micro-sway test: if center is right, any direction feels equally easy.
Finish with palm on belly ‚Äî remember this place of stability.
p3_9: Stand with warm center in belly, axis long.
Inhale ‚Äî gather axis; exhale ‚Äî allow form to shift slightly.
Explore changing orientation: turn body left/right, tilt forward/back ‚Äî 5‚Äì10¬∞.
Keep center fixed: palm on belly reminds ‚Äî here's your anchor.
Change form on exhale ‚Äî smooth, without jerks.
Return to neutral on inhale ‚Äî gather yourself back to axis.
If balance wobbles ‚Äî reduce amplitude, lengthen exhale.
Try different forms: squat slightly, reach up, spiral ‚Äî center stays.
Soften jaw, keep feet wide and warm.
Repeat: form serves task, but center never leaves home.
Finish standing neutral ‚Äî feel how center remained unmoved.
p3_10: Stand or sit in most stable position.
Reduce all external movement to almost zero.
Breathe quietly: inhale minimal, exhale slightly longer (4‚Äì6).
Notice natural pause after exhale ‚Äî that's where stillness lives.
Soften face, jaw, shoulders; let tongue be heavy.
Place attention in three supports: feet/sit bones ‚Üí belly ‚Üí heart.
If thought creates movement ‚Äî note it, return to pause after exhale.
Feel that within stillness life continues to pulse gently.
Don't chase silence ‚Äî let it settle around you like snow.
Listen for micro-pulse: heartbeat, breath echo, subtle vibration.
Stay several minutes ‚Äî stillness becomes tangible, like substance.
Finish slowly: first deepen breath, then allow small movement.
p3_11: Stand or sit, feet connected to floor/ground.
Place attention in feet soles and lower belly.
On inhale imagine slow, deep current rising from earth.
On exhale current flows down through you back into depths.
Breathe low: expand sides and lower back; upper body free.
Soften shoulders and jaw; let weight drain into support.
If mind goes to surface (thoughts, noise) ‚Äî return to low warm current in belly.
Keep rhythm 4‚Äì6 or slower ‚Äî Earth's pulse is measured.
Check axis: crown up, sacrum down; current flows along spine.
Reduce visible movement to almost zero, keep sensation of deep flow.
Let this current 'carry' attention ‚Äî effortless but steady.
Maintain foot contact: depth always finds path to earth.
p3_12: Stand in your current environment ‚Äî don't seek ideal conditions.
On inhale accept what is: temperature, sounds, sensations.
On exhale send weight down, strengthen connection to earth.
Breathe with environment rhythm: if noisy ‚Äî exhale longer, if cold ‚Äî breathe into belly.
Don't fight conditions ‚Äî adjust form while keeping center.
If uncomfortable ‚Äî micro-shift position on exhale, find new stability.
Keep feet warm and wide; let earth be constant while everything else changes.
Soften jaw and shoulders; adaptation happens through release, not tension.
Repeat: inhale accepts, exhale anchors ‚Äî this is your working rhythm.
Notice how body finds solutions when you stop insisting.
Stay several minutes, let new form settle.
Finish knowing: environment is not obstacle, it's information for adaptation.

final_phrases.p1_1:
You inhaled life.
And life inhaled you.
final_phrases.p1_2:
You are.
And that is enough.
final_phrases.p1_3:
Life pulsates in you.
And you pulsate in life.
final_phrases.p1_4: When you freeze, life continues to flow inside you.
final_phrases.p1_5:
When you listen to the body,
Earth answers you with breath.
final_phrases.p1_6:
Light awakened in you.
And now it breathes with your breath.
final_phrases.p1_7:
You are movement of life.
And water inside you recognizes the ocean.
final_phrases.p1_8:
You count breath,
and breath counts you as part of life.
final_phrases.p1_9:
You found the silence
in which Earth listens to your breath.
final_phrases.p1_10:
You became Earth's breath.
And silence speaks your name.
final_phrases.p1_11:
With each exhale Earth accepts you.
And your roots remember the path to strength.
final_phrases.p1_12:
Earth holds you.
Your body is home, and roots remember the path to strength.
final_phrases.p2_1: When you stop pushing water, water begins to carry you.
final_phrases.p2_2: Direction is the place where breath feels easy.
final_phrases.p2_3: When movement breathes, body becomes music of water.
final_phrases.p2_4: When breath holds axis, water doesn't knock down ‚Äî it carries.
final_phrases.p2_5: When form becomes fluid, movement happens by itself.
final_phrases.p2_6: When you breathe like sea, peace comes on its own.
final_phrases.p2_7: When body chooses ease, flow chooses you.
final_phrases.p2_8: When attention is anchor, flow doesn't carry you away, it guides.
final_phrases.p2_9: When center is calm, any direction becomes easy.
final_phrases.p2_10: When inner water becomes smooth, everything is seen clearly.
final_phrases.p2_11: When you hear depth, surface stops controlling you.
final_phrases.p2_12: When breath calls and body answers, ocean is heard from within.
final_phrases.p3_1: Where inhale is water and exhale is earth, your stability is born.
final_phrases.p3_2: In center ‚Äî peace; and then any environment becomes support.
final_phrases.p3_3: When center is stable, any form becomes yours.
final_phrases.p3_4: When air fills and earth receives, peace is born in center.
final_phrases.p3_5: When body knows how to carry weight, every step becomes reliable.
final_phrases.p3_6: When spine becomes wave and feet become roots, balance is born.
final_phrases.p3_7: When breath unites water and earth, you become bridge.
final_phrases.p3_8: When center stands above support, world stops shaking you.
final_phrases.p3_9: When form changes without losing center, you master adaptation.
final_phrases.p3_10: When stillness resonates, you hear pulse of silence.
final_phrases.p3_11: When you breathe with Earth, anxiety goes into depths.
final_phrases.p3_12: When breath accepts and anchors, environment becomes your ally.

level_1.intro: Learn to be aware of presence ‚Äî to feel your existence as a miracle. Stabilize your breath, return attention to your body, awaken the sensation of "living light" within.
level_1.game_task: Game and energetic task ‚Äî activation of the Presence biofield.
level_1.principle_1: You don't act ‚Äî you sense, listen, breathe.
level_1.principle_2: Each exercise is a step deeper into awareness:
level_1.principle_3: from breath ‚Üí to body ‚Üí to warmth ‚Üí to silence ‚Üí to stillness.
level_1.story_1: You awaken in soft, timeless light.
level_1.story_2: No boundaries, no "yesterday" ‚Äî only the sensation of warmth, pulse and breath.
level_1.story_3: The world around is liquid, alive, like the beginning of the Universe.
level_1.story_4: Each breath becomes your first movement.
level_1.identity_1: You are the Amoeba, the first cell of consciousness, awakening itself.
level_1.identity_2: You don't yet know who you are.
level_1.wisdom_1: All that's required is to learn to be.
level_1.wisdom_2: Without goal, without struggle, without striving.
level_1.wisdom_3: Feel life not with your mind, but with your body.
level_1.wisdom_4: Remember the ancient language of breath, warmth and light, the language Earth speaks.

level_2.intro: Learn to be aware of movement ‚Äî to feel direction through body and flow. Synchronize breath and wave step, trust the current, find balance in the changing environment.
level_2.game_task: Game and energetic task ‚Äî activation of the Flow field (sensorimotor connection).
level_2.principle_1: You don't control ‚Äî you feel, follow, breathe.
level_2.principle_2: Each exercise is a step toward fluidity:
level_2.principle_3: from stillness ‚Üí to impulse ‚Üí to wave ‚Üí to direction ‚Üí to silence within movement.
level_2.story_1: You awaken in a liquid world where boundaries are softened.
level_2.story_2: Water touches your skin, and breath becomes current.
level_2.story_3: There are no routes or maps ‚Äî only rhythm calling you forward.
level_2.identity_1: You are the Fish, the first navigator of consciousness.
level_2.identity_2: You don't plan yet ‚Äî you attune.
level_2.identity_3: You seek not a path, but resonance: where the body feels ease, there is truth.
level_2.wisdom_1: Inhale ‚Äî gathers you into one line. Exhale ‚Äî admits you into the wave and returns you to center.
level_2.wisdom_2: With each cycle, a natural trajectory emerges ‚Äî not invented by mind, but found by senses.
level_2.wisdom_3: All that's required ‚Äî allow movement to be born from breath. Without struggle, without haste, without tension.
level_2.wisdom_4: Feel the world not with eyes, but with skin; hear direction not with ears, but with heart. Remember the ancient language of currents, fluidity and depth, the language Water speaks.

level_3.intro: Learn to adapt ‚Äî unite water's fluidity and earth's support. Stabilize your center in change, breathe between two worlds and find balance where the environment shifts.
level_3.game_task: Game and energetic task ‚Äî activation of the Adaptation field (TERRA form stability).
level_3.principle_1: You don't choose "water or land" ‚Äî you become the bridge.
level_3.principle_2: Each breath is a transition: inhale discovers the new, exhale anchors support.
level_3.principle_3: Each exercise is a step toward stability: from water ‚Üí to shore ‚Üí to step ‚Üí to balance ‚Üí to plasticity.
level_3.story_1: You emerge at the boundary. Air is denser, earth heavier, gravity louder.
level_3.story_2: Lungs learn to drink air, muscles seek new rhythm, attention pulses between "glide" and "stand".
level_3.story_3: You feel the world's weight beneath you ‚Äî and for the first time understand that heaviness can be support.
level_3.identity_1: You are the Amphibian, a form of transition.
level_3.identity_2: You still remember the smoothness of waves, but already hear Earth's pulse in your feet.
level_3.identity_3: Mistakes become movement, falls become balance training, and pauses become form's breathing.
level_3.wisdom_1: Inhale ‚Äî gathers you in center. Exhale ‚Äî sends roots through legs into soil.
level_3.wisdom_2: Breathe as if uniting ocean and stone within your body.
level_3.wisdom_3: All that's required ‚Äî to change without losing yourself. Feel the world as flow and support simultaneously.
level_3.wisdom_4: Remember the ancient language of thresholds and transitions that the shore speaks: in it your stability is born.

level_1.quote_1: Breath is the first bridge between you and the world.
level_1.quote_2: You don't learn to exist ‚Äî you remember.
level_1.quote_3: Every cell of your body knows how to be.
level_1.quote_4: Allow yourself to simply feel. The rest will come on its own.

level_2.quote_1: As long as you move ‚Äî you're alive.
level_2.quote_2: Don't control the sea ‚Äî listen to its rhythm.
level_2.quote_4: Trust the current, and it will bring you home.

level_3.quote_1: Earth grants form to those ready to hold on.
level_3.quote_2: Choose not by force, but by wisdom.
level_3.quote_3: A boundary is not a wall, but a teacher.
level_3.quote_4: Your body remembers how to survive and thrive.

level_1.line_3: Now your roots have absorbed the light,
level_1.line_4: and Earth is ready to release you into the flow.

level_2.line_1: You learned to move without losing silence.
level_2.line_2: In you, water found consciousness, and peace became a song.
level_2.line_3: Each of your breaths is a wave,
level_2.line_4: each exhale ‚Äî a return to the depths.
level_2.line_5: Now your fluidity is ready to meet the earth.

level_3.line_1: You learned to hold and release.
level_3.line_3: Now you're ready for the next step ‚Äî choice and action.

body_cocoon.name: Body Cocoon
body_cocoon.short_phrase: Hug yourself. Create a warm shell of safety.
body_cocoon.guiding_1: Hug your shoulders or torso, let your palms feel warmth.
body_cocoon.guiding_2: Take a soft breath in through your nose, long exhale through your mouth.
body_cocoon.guiding_3: With each exhale, release your shoulders and jaw.
body_cocoon.guiding_4: Imagine a warm translucent cocoon forming around you.
body_cocoon.guiding_5: Breathe inside it: inhale ‚Äî gather yourself; exhale ‚Äî calm down.
body_cocoon.guiding_6: Notice how your heart beats calmer under your palms.
body_cocoon.guiding_7: If a thought worries you ‚Äî call it "thought" and return to body sensations.
body_cocoon.guiding_8: Reduce breath amplitude to comfortable, leave it natural.
body_cocoon.guiding_9: Allow yourself to be small and protected ‚Äî now it's possible.
body_cocoon.final_phrase: You are safe. Your body knows how to embrace you from within.

light_inhale.name: Light Breath
light_inhale.short_phrase: Inhale ‚Äî gather light in your chest, exhale ‚Äî gently spread it through your body.
light_inhale.guiding_1: Sit comfortably. Relax your shoulders and jaw.
light_inhale.guiding_2: On the inhale, imagine a warm ray entering the center of your chest.
light_inhale.guiding_3: On the exhale, let this light spread through your arms, belly, face.
light_inhale.guiding_4: Let your eyes 'smile from within', your gaze becomes soft and clear.
light_inhale.guiding_5: Breathe evenly; you don't need to push the light ‚Äî it finds its own way.
light_inhale.guiding_6: If attention wanders, return to the first touch of light in your chest.
light_inhale.guiding_7: With each cycle, add a grain of gratitude.
light_inhale.guiding_8: Let your body become a bit lighter, and your breath even warmer.
light_inhale.final_phrase: With each inhale you receive light, with each exhale you become light.

inner_spark.name: Inner Spark
inner_spark.short_phrase: Name your intention in a whisper. Let the spark ignite in your chest.
inner_spark.guiding_1: Place attention in the center of your chest and say inside a short 'why'.
inner_spark.guiding_2: On the inhale ‚Äî gather warmth and clarity in one point.
inner_spark.guiding_3: On the exhale ‚Äî let this point flare with gentle light.
inner_spark.guiding_4: Breathe as if feeding the flame with oxygen: calmly, evenly, carefully.
inner_spark.guiding_5: If attention scatters ‚Äî return to the intention-word and to the warmth in your chest.
inner_spark.guiding_6: Feel how the the the spark becomes steady ‚Äî not brighter, but more reliable.
inner_spark.final_phrase: The spark of intention burns quietly ‚Äî and that's enough to begin.

slow_glow.name: Slow Glow
slow_glow.short_phrase: Slow down. Let breath ignite a soft light within.
slow_glow.guiding_1: Sit (or lie) comfortably. Let your body settle heavily into support.
slow_glow.guiding_2: On the inhale, imagine a dim warm glow in your belly.
slow_glow.guiding_3: On the exhale, the light slightly expands ‚Äî to chest, shoulders, face.
slow_glow.guiding_4: Breathe slowly: inhale shorter, exhale longer ‚Äî as if you're extinguishing tension.
slow_glow.guiding_5: Mouth gently open or exhale through nose ‚Äî whichever is more comfortable.
slow_glow.guiding_6: Relax forehead, eyes, tongue, shoulders. Allow heaviness to be.
slow_glow.guiding_7: If attention drifts ‚Äî return to the light in belly and long exhale.
slow_glow.guiding_8: Let each breath make the light steadier, and the body calmer.
slow_glow.final_phrase: The light remained, fatigue went deeper into the earth.

earth_breath.name: Earth Breath
earth_breath.short_phrase: Inhale ‚Äî to chest, exhale ‚Äî into the earth. Feel the support beneath your feet.
earth_breath.guiding_1: Stand steadily and widen the contact of your feet with the ground.
earth_breath.guiding_2: Inhale ‚Äî lift attention from feet to chest, open shoulders, warm the center.
earth_breath.guiding_3: Exhale ‚Äî release everything down through legs into earth, as if roots are growing.
earth_breath.guiding_4: Let gravity do the work for you; knees soft, jaw relaxed.
earth_breath.guiding_5: If mind wanders ‚Äî return to soles: warmth, weight, floor pressure.
earth_breath.guiding_6: With each inhale fill chest with calmness, with each exhale deepen roots.
earth_breath.guiding_7: You are the trunk; breath is sap, earth is your support.
earth_breath.final_phrase: With each exhale the Earth receives you, and inside becomes quieter.

wave_pulse.name: Wave Pulse
wave_pulse.short_phrase: Connect breath and heart: inhale ‚Äî wave rises, exhale ‚Äî gentle fall.
wave_pulse.guiding_1: Sit comfortably. Place your palm on your heart or find pulse on your wrist.
wave_pulse.guiding_2: Feel the gentle beating ‚Äî this is rhythm you can lean on.
wave_pulse.guiding_3: Inhale ‚Äî wave rises from heart to chest and shoulders.
wave_pulse.guiding_4: Exhale ‚Äî wave descends down, carrying tension to belly and further to feet.
wave_pulse.guiding_5: Breathe smoothly, without effort; let body choose depth of inhale and length of exhale.
wave_pulse.guiding_6: With each exhale soften jaw and shoulders; let belly become warm and free.
wave_pulse.guiding_7: If attention wanders ‚Äî return to palm on heart and first pulse beat.
wave_pulse.guiding_8: Imagine how each inhale gathers peace, and each exhale spreads it through entire body.
wave_pulse.guiding_9: Breath is the sea, pulse is its shore: meet the wave and bid it farewell with gratitude.
wave_pulse.guiding_10: Stay in this movement until wave becomes almost invisible, and peace tangible.
wave_pulse.final_phrase: When heart and breath sound as one wave, silence reigns within.

sphere_breath.name: Sphere Breath
sphere_breath.short_phrase: Imagine a sphere around your body. Inhale ‚Äî it expands, exhale ‚Äî gently gathers to center.
sphere_breath.guiding_1: Sit steadily; spine is axis, crown up, pelvis heavy in support.
sphere_breath.guiding_2: Imagine a transparent sphere, center in chest or belly.
sphere_breath.guiding_3: On inhale sphere expands evenly in all directions: forward, back, up, down, diagonally.
sphere_breath.guiding_4: On exhale it gently returns to center, not losing evenness.
sphere_breath.guiding_5: Breathe through 'surface' of sphere ‚Äî as if skin listens to space around.
sphere_breath.guiding_6: Keep edges equal: no effort, no collapse ‚Äî pure symmetry of attention.
sphere_breath.guiding_7: If thoughts distract ‚Äî return to sphere boundary and its touch with air.
sphere_breath.guiding_8: Let center remain calm, and breath be movement of world around it.
sphere_breath.guiding_9: The wider the sphere, the quieter inside.
sphere_breath.final_phrase: When sphere breathes, you become the center of a calm world.

light_flow.name: Light Flow
light_flow.short_phrase: Inhale ‚Äî lift light up spine, exhale ‚Äî spread it to shoulders and arms.
light_flow.guiding_1: Sit vertically: crown up, sacrum grows heavy downward.
light_flow.guiding_2: On inhale imagine light rising from pelvis to heart and to crown.
light_flow.guiding_3: On exhale direct light into shoulders, arms, palms ‚Äî like into riverbeds.
light_flow.guiding_4: Let movement stay smooth; don't push, follow the sensation.
light_flow.guiding_5: Notice where along the way light meets tension ‚Äî soften that place with breath.
light_flow.guiding_6: With each cycle feel more spaciousness in back and collarbones.
light_flow.guiding_7: Keep a kind inner gaze ‚Äî light flows easier.
light_flow.final_phrase: When light flows freely, actions become simple.

roots_breath.name: Roots Breath
roots_breath.short_phrase: Inhale ‚Äî to chest, exhale ‚Äî into feet. Let Earth take the excess.
roots_breath.guiding_1: Stand or sit so feet confidently touch the ground.
roots_breath.guiding_2: Feel the weight ‚Äî heels, balls, toes.
roots_breath.guiding_3: Inhale for four ‚Äî fill chest with gentle warmth.
roots_breath.guiding_4: Exhale for six ‚Äî direct attention down, into feet, into the earth.
roots_breath.guiding_5: Imagine roots spreading from soles to sides and depth.
roots_breath.guiding_6: On each exhale release excess: tension in belly, throat, forehead.
roots_breath.guiding_7: If mind drifts ‚Äî return to contact sole ‚Üî earth.
roots_breath.guiding_8: Breathe evenly, without effort; let gravity work for you.
roots_breath.guiding_9: The deeper the roots, the freer the breath becomes.
roots_breath.final_phrase: Earth holds you. With exhale anxiety goes down.

earth_pulse.name: Earth Pulse
earth_pulse.short_phrase: Tune into Earth's low rhythm. Let heart and breath calm down.
earth_pulse.guiding_1: Place palm on chest or belly, other on lower belly.
earth_pulse.guiding_2: Listen to the beating ‚Äî find its calmest tempo.
earth_pulse.guiding_3: Inhale ‚Äî barely noticeable rise under palm.
earth_pulse.guiding_4: Exhale ‚Äî gentle lowering, like wave going into depth.
earth_pulse.guiding_5: Imagine warm resonant sound at base of body ‚Äî support and weight.
earth_pulse.guiding_7: With each exhale let pulse become wider and softer.
earth_pulse.guiding_8: If rush appears ‚Äî lengthen exhale and notice pause after it.
earth_pulse.guiding_9: Stay in sensation of warm, heavy rhythm under feet.
earth_pulse.final_phrase: When you breathe in Earth's rhythm, anxiety loses power.

breath_possibility.name: Breath of Possibility
breath_possibility.short_phrase: Inhale ‚Äî 'I accept', exhale ‚Äî 'I can'. Feel the space of choice.
breath_possibility.guiding_1: On each inhale quietly say inside: 'I accept'.
breath_possibility.guiding_3: Let words match sensations in body: acceptance expands, possibility gathers to center.
breath_possibility.guiding_4: Imagine doorway before you: inhale ‚Äî door opens, exhale ‚Äî you take half-step with attention.
breath_possibility.guiding_5: If doubt appears ‚Äî surrender to long exhale and return to phrases.
breath_possibility.guiding_6: Keep soft posture and warm belly ‚Äî there determination is born without tension.
breath_possibility.final_phrase: Possibility breathes with you ‚Äî and each exhale makes the step more real.

onboarding.screen1_text1: ONDA Life ‚Äî a system of mindfulness and self-development practices for real life.
onboarding.screen1_list2: levels: from body support to higher states of consciousness;
onboarding.screen1_list4: internal currency OND for practices and missions.
onboarding.screen1_conclusion: Path: from body sensation ‚Äî to clarity, inspiration, and strength.
onboarding.screen2_text1: ONDA Life ‚Äî routes (waves and levels) of simple daily steps.
onboarding.screen2_list1: rely on body as a source of energy;
onboarding.screen2_list2: experience emotions as a language of connection;
onboarding.screen2_list3: use the mind for precise action;
onboarding.screen2_list4: kindle the soul by supporting others.
onboarding.screen2_conclusion: Each practice ‚Äî short breathing, attention to body, micro-movements, or contemplation.
onboarding.screen3_text1: We provide routes, tips, and support. For practices and missions you earn OND ‚Äî game currency:
onboarding.screen3_list2: from level 3, it can be converted to real money;
onboarding.screen3_list3: early level skills ‚Äî foundation for further growth.
onboarding.screen3_conclusion: Result: stable presence, calm, clarity, and inner support in life.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.feature2: 100+ audio practices for meditation and relaxation
subscription.feature3: Personalized practices based on your biometrics
subscription.feature4: Real-time heart rate tracking during practices
subscription.disclaimer: Totally free for 7 days, then 4.17 EUR/month, billed annually at 49.99 EUR/year. Cancel anytime.
